entry.name: icon
entry.label: The name of the icon to use for the compact representation (e.g. on a small panel).

entry.name: useCustomButtonImage
entry.label: Whether to use a custom image instead of an icon in the compact representation (e.g. on a small panel).

entry.name: customButtonImage
entry.label: The URL of the custtom image to use instead of an icon in the compact representation (e.g. on a small panel).

entry.name: appNameFormat
entry.label: The format used in the display of application names: 0 = NameOnly, 1 = GenericNameOnly, 2 = NameAndGenericName, 3 = GenericNameAndName

entry.name: recentOrdering
entry.label: How should the previously used apps/docs/contacts be ordered: 0 = RecentFirst, 1 = PopularFirst

entry.name: favoriteApps
entry.label: List of general favorites. Supported values are menu id's (usually .desktop file names), special URLs that expand into default applications (e.g. preferred://browser), document URLs and KPeople contact URIs.

entry.name: favoriteSystemActions
entry.label: List of system action favorites.

entry.name: favoritesPortedToKAstats
entry.label: Are the favorites ported to use KActivitiesStats to allow per-activity favorites

entry.name: hiddenApplications
entry.label: List of menu id's (usually .desktop file names) of apps that should not be shown in the menu.

entry.name: showRecentApps
entry.label: Whether to show the "Recent Applications" category.

entry.name: showRecentDocs
entry.label: Whether to show the "Recent Documents" category.

entry.name: gridAllowTwoLines
entry.label: Whether to allow showing two lines in grid view.

entry.name: showRecentContacts
entry.label: Whether to show the "Recent Contacts" category.

entry.name: useExtraRunners
entry.label: Whether to use additional KRunner plugins to produce results in the search.

entry.name: extraRunners
entry.label: The plugin id's of additional KRunner plugins to use. Only used if useExtraRunners is true.

entry.name: menuPosition
entry.label: The position of the menu: 0 = Center, 1 = Edge, 2 = Auto

entry.name: favGridModel
entry.label: The model for favorite grid / pinned apps grid: 0 = Favourite apps, 1 = Recent apps, 2 = Recent Documents

entry.name: recentGridModel
entry.label: The model for recent item grid / recommended grid: 0 = Recent Documents, 1 = Recent apps, 2 = Favourite apps, 3 = None

entry.name: showDescription
entry.label: Whether to show the description for app and search items or not.

entry.name: alwaysShowSearchBar
entry.label: Whether to always show the search bar on top of the menu or not.

entry.name: preferFullName
entry.label: Whether to prefer showing the user's full name in the menu, instead of the login name.

entry.name: downIconsDocuments
entry.label: Shows or hides the Documents shortcut on the bottom bar.

entry.name: downIconsPictures
entry.label: Shows or hides the Pictures shortcut on the bottom bar.

entry.name: downIconsMusic
entry.label: Shows or hides the Music shortcut on the bottom bar.

entry.name: downIconsDownloads
entry.label: Shows or hides the Downloads shortcut on the bottom bar.

entry.name: downIconsVideos
entry.label: Shows or hides the Videos shortcut on the bottom bar.

entry.name: downIconsFileManager
entry.label: Shows or hides the File Manager (aka Dolphin) shortcut on the bottom bar.

entry.name: downIconsSystemSettings
entry.label: Shows or hides the System Settings shortcut on the bottom bar.

entry.name: downIconsLock
entry.label: Shows or hides the Lock button on the bottom bar.

entry.name: downIconsPowerOptions
entry.label: Shows or hides the Power Options button on the bottom bar.

entry.name: defaultAllApps
entry.label: Whether to show All Apps screen by default or not.

entry.name: reduceIconSizeFooter
entry.label: Whether to reduce icon size for footer to match consistency.
